group_1.textRight: My memories!

group_1.textLeft: [flashEffect:flashWhite2][bgEffect:shakeSmall][surround:4011A04]...!

group_1.narration: I was on a mission with Umika and Kaoru@to get my mind back together...
And finally...
―Umika―@X File!
―Kaoru―@Palla Di Cannone!
―Umika―@Kazumi!
―Kaoru―@Go, gooo!
―Kazumi―@...Now!
―Kazumi―@Limity Esterni!

group_1.textRight: We...we...
We did it! Umika! Kaoru!

group_1.textLeft: It's over...

group_1.textRight: We won!

group_1.narration: I finally got myself back!

group_1.textRight: It seems you were successful!

group_1.textLeft: Just barely...
Were you okay while we were connected@to the Soul Gems?

group_1.textRight: It got pretty dangerous for a while there.@I think I only just made it back.

group_1.textLeft: I'm totally beat...
Yeah, like...this time I'm gonna be the one@who passes out, ya know...

group_1.textRight: I'm...not going to kill myself... At least,@not until I get some rest...

group_1.textLeft: It was ridiculously strong. I don't know how@much longer we could've kept that up...

group_1.textRight: I...could still fight...obviously!@*Wheeze*

group_1.textLeft: Your knees are shaking right now,@Princess Rye.

group_1.textRight: It's Ria!@[chara:301001:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:301001:cheek_0][chara:301001:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:301001:lipSynch_1]I am not...made of...
...grains...

group_1.textLeft: Oh no, Princess Ria!@I think...I gotta take a little nap...
Emily! Oh, and Asuka! Sasara!
Are they all...gonna...um...

group_1.textRight: Don't worry. It wasn't your fault.

group_1.textLeft: Still, the doppelganger might not have attacked@them if I'd kept myself together...

group_1.textRight: Everyone just got mixed up in one of @the incidents here.
Yes, she's right.
If you're still bothered by it, you can always@pay 'em back some day.

group_1.textLeft: ...Are you sure that'll make things all right?

group_1.textRight: Nooo, don't even apologize! Everything@wound up totally fine!
It really did!
We must help each other in times of need!

group_1.textLeft: I suppose we can say...everything worked@out! Right?

group_1.textRight: Well, it definitely did for you. You made a@killing off of us!

group_1.textLeft: H-hey now, Tsuruno! You don't need to be@so blunt!

group_1.textRight: And you can pay me back whenever!
No, just kidding. I'm not stingy like that!

group_1.textLeft: Thank you! Um...
Ria!

group_1.textRight: What?! Oh, I... You're welcome!
(She remembered my name! I'm sooo happy!)

group_1.textLeft: Really, everyone... Thank you so, so much!

group_1.textRight: Thank you very much for your help!
Yeah, you really helped us out! Thanks!
Can I ask you one last thing?

group_1.textLeft: Sure!

group_1.textRight: What did your friends sound like when@you heard their voices?

group_1.textLeft: Hmmm...it was like...well... It wasn't like@I could hear them clearly...
But...I don't know... It always felt like@they were close to me.
Strong, but kind...@A tender, caring feeling...
Even if I was by myself, I wasn't alone.
As long as my stomach was rumbling, I could stay@alive. I could fight as hard as I could...
Because I have faith in everyone@who matters to me!

group_1.narration: I learned later that I never actually@lost my memories. I only thought I did@because a [textBlue:Rumor] took control of me@from within my own mind...

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, yeah! Right from the start you told me@you were looking for somebody.

group_1.textRight: The same happened when we met her.

group_1.textLeft: You even said to me, "I'm a Magical Girl@too!"

group_1.narration: When I was following the voices, I was@in a place between reality and the [textBlue:Rumor].
I don't know which parts were@real and which parts weren't...
It really confuses me when I think about it.

group_1.textLeft: The world we're in now, where we're together,@is the real world, Kazumi.

group_1.textRight: Even in a dream world, as long as all three@of us are together, we'll be fine!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah! As long as I have you two,@I've got nothing to fear!
Only in Kamihama could this sort of@"incident" occur...
Let's get home to Asunaro City.
(And in Asunaro...we'll have our own@"incidents" to worry about...)

group_1.narration: And so, the three of us left Kamihama.
But before we did...

group_1.textRight: All right! Time to go home! There's no place@like it!

group_1.textLeft: It's a shame... That mushroom hotpot was @really delicious.
I thought of a name for it!@[chara:401101:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:401101:cheek_0][chara:401101:face_mtn_ex_020.exp.json][chara:401101:lipSynch_1]It's... "Kamiha-mushroom soup"!
I'll try and make some for you soon!

group_1.textRight: The fried rice...was just ordinary!

group_1.textLeft: That's the way it should be!

group_1.textRight: Shall we take a trip to the supermarket?

group_1.textLeft: Hm? Why do you want to go there?

group_1.textRight: Well, Kazumi, supermarkets in different@cities...
...are prime hiding places for new@ingredients and local delicacies!
Yeah, that's right! I really want to see@what pastries they've got!

group_1.textLeft: Oh, nice! Okay, then...
Let's go to the supermarket!

group_1.narration: And so, things went back to normal...
Our everyday Magical Girl life in Asunaro.
But you know what? Whenever I cook@fried rice or Kamiha-mushroom soup...
...it reminds me that I'm not alone.@That Magical Girls can work together...
And that's why I can face down Witches without@fear, together with the friends I trust most!
